title: Hamilton pours cold water on Ferrari's new suspension hype
summary: Ferrari fans have been hoping that a new suspension upgrade could put the team in the mix for F1 victory at Spa, but Lewis Hamilton doesn't share their optimism

qa_pairs.question: Which driver expressed skepticism about Ferrari's new suspension upgrades?
What is the significance of the Spa circuit in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is known for its challenging layout and elevation changes.
wrong_options: It is the shortest circuit on the calendar.
It features a street circuit layout.
It is primarily known for its high-speed straights.

qa_pairs.question: What was the expectation among Ferrari fans regarding the new suspension?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: They hoped it would improve the team's chances of victory.
wrong_options: They expected it to reduce tire wear dramatically.
They believed it would enhance engine performance.
They thought it would lead to a complete redesign of the car.
